name: Momento Temporis: Arena
description:
Momento Temporis: Arena is a multiplayer PvP arena game set in the same universe as Momento Temporis: Light from the Deep. There's melee combat, magic casting, platforming and stamina management. It draws some inspiration from traditional PvP arena games such as Unreal Tournament. The game also comes with a level editor!

The game is currently in development so expect a couple of bugs and incomplete stuff, but it is fully playable already!

Note: the demo has everything the purchasable version has except for online features.
